TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tayax, title = Tayax, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tayax} }

S.FORM: Tayax Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Tayax a niyaro', 38 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 142 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 141 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal94%, Amis1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Tayax Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Tayax a niyaro', 38 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 142 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 141 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal94%, Amis1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
